channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE Corporation -- LINE@ for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE Corporation -- LINE@ for Android

item.title: CVE-2015-2968|2024-08-06T05:32:20.717Z -- line%20corporation -- line%40%20for%20android
item.description: LINE@ for Android version 1.0.0 and LINE@ for iOS version 1.0.0 are vulnerable to MITM (man-in-the-middle) attack since the application allows non-SSL/TLS communications. As a result, any API may be invoked from a script injected by a MITM (man-in-the-middle) attacker.
